alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 9:46PM EDT until April 09 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Covington to Montezuma...and at Terre Haute to Mount Carmel. .Widespread lowland flooding continues along the Wabash River at Covington to Montezuma...and at Terre Haute to Mount Carmel. Moderate flooding is forecast to start at Mount Carmel late Friday...and continue through Tuesday. The slow crest on the Wabash River will continue between Hutsonville and Vincennes through Saturday. Minor flooding is expected to end above Terre Haute by late Friday...while continuing below Terre Haute into next week. Rain going into this weekend may extend flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY, APRIL 09... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Mount Carmel. * WHEN...Until Sunday, April 09. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, Extensive lowland flooding in progress. Much of the flood plain activity is affected by high water. Numerous local river roads flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday /9:00 PM EDT Thursday/ the stage was 24.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Thursday /9:00 PM EDT Thursday/ was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.6 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, April 08. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by noon Friday.
